prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Drums, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Guitar, Piano, and Drums, but without the Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Piano, and Drums, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Guitar, Piano, and Drums, with no Synth Pad.
